app.title: DAMSA - Download App for Microsoft Store Apps

mainWindow.title: DAMSA - Microsoft Store App Downloader
mainWindow.infoText: DAMSA allows you to download Microsoft Store apps without using the Microsoft Store. Simply enter the URL of a Microsoft Store app and select the desired files for download.

linklistWindow.title: DAMSA - Select Download Links
linklistWindow.infoText: The following download URLs were found. Please select all packages that should be downloaded:

urlErrorWindow.title: DAMSA - URL Error
urlErrorWindow.emptyUrlError: The URL input field is empty. Please enter a valid Microsoft Store app URL.
urlErrorWindow.invalidUrlError: The entered URL is not a valid Microsoft Store app URL. Please check the URL and try again.
